summary: New high school graduates June and her friends take over a dilapidated service station owned by her bed ridden uncle. They have to perform every trick in the book to compete against the modern station across the street.
cast: Kirsten Baker|Linda Lawrence|Sandy Johnson|Rikki Marin|Leslie King|Demetre Phillips|Steve Bond|Ken Lerner|Dave Shelley|Huntz Hall|Joe E. Ross|Mike Mazurki|Dennis Bowen|Robert Kenneally|Paul Tinder|'Cousin Brucie' Morrow|Michael Alden|Morris Buchanan|Kay Elliot|Norman Fields|Loutz Gage|John F. Goff|Jack Jozefson|Brett Lewis|Bill Lytle|John Majesko|Eileen Marek|Clifford Martin III|Peter Spitzer|Robert Sutton|Bruce Dowling
title: Gas Pump Girls
